00061         public: /***  1D-MEMORY FUNCTIONS  ***/
00068                 template<typename T>
00069                 memory1D<T> allocate_memory1D(std::size_t size) const {
00070                         T* devptr;
00071                         if (cudaMalloc( static_cast<void**>( &devptr ), sizeof(T)*size ) != cudaSuccess) {
00072                                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00073                         }
00074 
00075                         return memory1D<T>(devptr, size);
00076                 }
00077 
00083                 template<typename T>
00084                 void free (const memory1D<T>& memory) const {
00085                         if (cudaFree(memory.pointer_) != cudaSuccess) {
00086                                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089 
00096                 template <typename T>
00097                 void copy_host_to_device(const T* src, const memory1D<T>& dest) {
00098                         if (cudaMemcpy(dest.pointer_, src, dest.size() *sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00099                                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00100                         }
00101                 }
00102 
00109                 template <typename T>
00110                 void copy_device_to_host(const memory1D<T>& src, T* dest) {
00111                         if (cudaMemcpy(dest, src.pointer_, p.size_*sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost) != cudaSuccess) {
00112                                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00113                         }
00114                 }
00115                 
00116         public: /*** UTILITY FUNCTIONS ***/
00120                 static const int device_count() {
00121                         int device_cnt = 0;
00122                         cudaGetDeviceCount(&device_cnt);
00123 
00124                         return device_cnt;
00125                 }
00126 #endif
